entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
